name: Birb (OneSmolDev)
description:
Birb is a virtual pet birb. They are a sweet child and you must keep them happy

This project was created for the Week 119 Weekly Game jam. The theme was Tamagotchi and I was already working on a project with the Cute Bird pack so I decided to create a small prototype where you can feed, pet and give water to the birb.

[Developer Note 1] Currently the prototype lacks a start menu , to exit the game on Windows 64 bit, please use alt tab.

[Developer Note 2] An Android version of the game is built but was found to have problems and has not been uploaded as part of this project.
